attributes.action: We want Lincolnshire County Council to cut our grass.
attributes.background: They just stopped cutting and funding the grass cutting

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. This the responsibility of your local council.

You could raise your issue with a local councillor, who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them:

https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
